description: '''Gilles Jérôme Moehrle''' [[Member of the Most Excellent Order of the British Empire|MBE]] ({{IPA|fr|ʒil ʒeʁom muʁl}}; born 28 September 1964), better known as '''Gilles Peterson''' ({{IPAc-en|dʒ|aɪ|l|z}}), is a broadcaster, DJ, record label and festival owner. He is renowned for his genre-defying approach to music with [[jazz]] at its core. From this base he has systematically championed a whole range of music from across the globe moving from [[dance music]] to experimental and all points in-between.
